thread.title: Select Income REIT Names David M. Blackman as Managing Trustee

author: cnbc.com
title: Select Income REIT Names David M. Blackman as Managing Trustee
text:
NEWTON, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Select Income REIT (Nasdaq: SIR) today announced that David M. Blackman has been elected as a Managing Trustee of SIR effective April 2, 2018 to fill a vacancy on the Board.
Mr. Blackman (age 55) has been President and Chief Operating Officer of SIR since 2012. In addition, Mr. Blackman is Executive Vice President of The RMR Group LLC and serves as an executive officer of other publicly traded companies managed by The RMR Group LLC. Prior to joining The RMR Group in 2009, Mr. Blackman was a real estate investment banker at Wachovia Corporation and its predecessors for over 20 years.
Select Income REIT is a real estate investment trust, or REIT, which owns properties that are primarily net leased to single tenants. SIR is managed by the operating subsidiary of The RMR Group Inc. (Nasdaq: RMR), an alternative asset management company that is headquartered in Newton, MA.
A Maryland Real Estate Investment Trust with transferable shares of beneficial interest listed on the Nasdaq.
No shareholder, Trustee or officer is personally liable for any act or obligation of the Trust.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180403005454/en/
Select Income REIT
Christopher Ranjitkar, 617-796-8320
Director, Investor Relations
Source: Select Income REIT
